a.h1: Westville Public Schools Home of the Yellowjackets

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

b.em: Our mission is to educate all learners to reach their potential as productive citizens.

div.p: Parents of junior high or high school students if your child completes a paper packet please email or text a picture of the completed assignments to the teacher letting them know that the work is complete. If your child is failing a class or you cannot contact the teacher through email or text please drop your child’s packet off in the grade level box located in the foyer of the central office. The central office will be open from 9am-1pm Monday through Thursday. Thank You

Parents of freshmen, one of the few requirements that the State has not waived is the completion of Financial Literacy. If your child is currently enrolled in Mrs. Heustis’ Financial Literacy they must complete the paper packet or online program. When your child completes their packets you can drop them off in the 9th grade drop box in the foyer of the central office. Email Mrs. Heustis sheustis@westville.k12.ok.us or Mr. Yeager kyeager@westville.k12.ok.us if you have any questions. Thank you
Westville school will be serving grab and go meals on Wednesday April, 15 from 10-1 and also passing out packets to students.

Happy Easter!!! We will be serving the grab and go lunch again tomorrow. We will also hand out packets for students tomorrow. PreK-6 will be in the elementary gym and the 7-12 will be in the HS gym from 10 am -1pm. Thank you

Tonight at 8:20 we will honor our Seniors. All across the nation schools are turning on their football lights at 20:20 (8:20) for 20 minutes for the Class of 2020!!! We love our seniors and miss them very much.

p.a: Event: Varsity Softball vs Sallisaw Central, V/JV
Event: Varsity Soccer vs Regent Prep
